about_the_game:
This DLC unlocks the official leaderboard in the free OpenVR Benchmark software. Buy this to support the development of OpenVR Benchmark.

In the leaderboard, you see all results that were submitted by OpenVR Benchmark users. You can filter the results to show only results using the same headset that you are using (useful for seeing how different GPUs perform in VR when using the same headset) and you can filter the results to show only results using the same GPU you are using (useful for seeing how much more performance one VR headset requires compared to another one).

You can also submit your name to the leaderboard. By default, everyone running the benchmark submits the result as "Anonym", and the result shows up as "Anonym" in the leaderboard. After you bought this DLC, you can set it to make your name publicly visible in the leaderboard to proudly show off your result.
detailed_description:
This DLC unlocks the official leaderboard in the free OpenVR Benchmark software. Buy this to support the development of OpenVR Benchmark.

In the leaderboard, you see all results that were submitted by OpenVR Benchmark users. You can filter the results to show only results using the same headset that you are using (useful for seeing how different GPUs perform in VR when using the same headset) and you can filter the results to show only results using the same GPU you are using (useful for seeing how much more performance one VR headset requires compared to another one).

You can also submit your name to the leaderboard. By default, everyone running the benchmark submits the result as "Anonym", and the result shows up as "Anonym" in the leaderboard. After you bought this DLC, you can set it to make your name publicly visible in the leaderboard to proudly show off your result.
name: OpenVR Benchmark Leaderboard

subs.option_text: OpenVR Benchmark Leaderboard Unlock DLC - $3.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: CPU with AVX Support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3 GB GPU with DirectX 11 Support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: CPU with AVX Support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3 GB GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
